tool_description: Calculates optimal dispatch decisions considering medical priority, resource availability, response times, and system load balancing.

unit_distances.description: Distance in miles for each unit

estimated_arrivals.description: ETA in minutes for each unit

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: available_units, unit_distances, and estimated_arrivals must have same length
Invalid priority level: Must be integer 1-5
Empty unit arrays: At least one available unit must be provided
Invalid system load: Must be number between 0 and 1
Invalid weather condition: Use clear, rain, snow, or severe
usage: Input triage priority and available resources to calculate optimal dispatch assignment with load balancing.

backup_units.description: Alternative units in order of preference

priority_score.description: Calculated priority score for this dispatch
